name: Hopping Mad (V)
Lore: '''I''m standing here in pieces and you''re having delusions of grandeur!''',
Text: 'Deploy on non-[Episode I] C-3PO. Once per turn, you may take How Did We Get Into This Mess?, Thank The Maker, We''re Doomed, or Mantellian Savrip into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. If C-3PO present at a battleground, Savrip is immune to Alter. Thank The Maker is a Used Interrupt and treat ''5'' in its game text as ''3''.',
